description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 75552/APP/2022/2745, dated 27-01-2023 (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission ref. 75552/APP/2020/2236 dated 28/04/2021 for the erection of a detached two storey 3-bed dwelling with habitable roofspace and associated parking and amenity space with the subsequent variation being an increase in the depth of the dwelling by 3m, alteration of dormers, removal of the side chimney, changes to fenestration and relocation of the garden shed) to amend accessibility requirements associated with condition 10 of the original permission
decision_conditions: The following amendment to Condition 10 is non material and is as follows:

The dwellings hereby approved shall be constructed to meet the standards for a Category 2 M4(1) dwelling, as set out in Approved Document M to the Building Regulations (2010) 2015, and all such provisions shall remain in place for the life of the building.
REASON: To ensure that an appropriate standard of housing stock, in accordance with London Plan policy D6, is achieved and maintained.
Notwithstanding the non-material amendment to Condition 10 hereby approved, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 75552/APP/2022/2745, dated 27-01-2023 remain relevant.
